short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows each class's grade as a 100% on StudentVue! (Does not affect your actual grades in StudentVue's database).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show off your fake grades! This addon makes each of your class's grades appear to be 100%! StudentVue's database is not affected. This addon only changes what the website shows.
